TopicTitle: Plugin coders wanted for Planet Factory Mods

Articles.Content:
Hey! Recently I've joined a team with Kcreator, and GavinColeX. And we're making Planet Factory Mods!

But Gavin had an awesome idea of making an awesome solar system! http://tinyurl.com/mmepvhn

But it looks like Gavin asked for too much... So as of today, we are letting modders in our team to help us, and we won't always work on this awesome solar system, We will work on other projects so we're all happy...

Gavin's suggestion video: http://tinyurl.com/pxz6ke7

How to get in our team:

1. Watch the suggestion video.

2. Post a comment saying that you want to participate.

3. PROOF: make sure Gavin knows that you play Kerbal Space Program!

4. Wait for Gavin to reply to you!

BTW:At this time, we are only accepting people who know how to make mods as in CODING.

Edited September 17, 2014 by sumghai
Edited thread title for clarity
[MOD - This add-on authoring recruitment thread has been moved to the General Add-on Affairs subforums]

You may want to check out http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88168

It is the successor to Planet Factory and may be a better framework to base your solar system on.

You may want to check out http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88168

It is the successor to Planet Factory and may be a better framework to base your solar system on.

Yes indeed it has many more features than planet factory, planet factory Clones planets and puts them were you told them and changes terrain maps ect, while this mod Rebuilds planets from scratch, rebuilding from scratch allows stuff like procedural surfaces made by the mod slippery ice and A lot more. However the mod is incomplete and you cannot do much yet with it except simple planets
